name: design-knockout-sgrna
title: Design CRISPR Knockout sgRNAs
description: Design optimized sgRNAs for CRISPR-Cas9 gene knockout
content:
Overview

This application designs sgRNAs for CRISPR knockout by searching pre-computed sgRNA libraries with ranked guides.

Features

  • Pre-computed sgRNA libraries
  • Supports human and mouse
  • Returns top-ranked guides
  • Optimized for knockout efficiency

Parameters

  • Gene Name: Target gene symbol
  • Data Lake Path: Path to sgRNA library files
  • Species: human or mouse
  • Number of Guides: How many to return

Output

Returns optimized sgRNA sequences for the target gene.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni pandas && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/design_knockout_sgrna.py "${geneName}" "${dataLakePath}" --species "${species}" --num-guides ${numGuides} -o "${outputDir}"
